titleStmt.title: A dissuasive from the errours of the time wherein the tenets of the principall sects, especially of the Independents, are drawn together in one map, for the most part in the words of their own authours, and their maine principles are examined by the touch-stone of the Holy Scriptures / by Robert Baylie ...
titleStmt.author: Baillie, Robert, 1599-1662.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
